channel.description: Week 3 Announcements This Week Today: Lab 1 Due 7 PM Mon 9/20: Discussion 1 Mon 9/20: Lab 2 Due 7 PM Lab 2 Redo Lab 1 using Puppet Reinstall OS, Install Puppet, Make Snapshot Write Puppet Manifest & Test Keep it Simple! Use puppet resource to query Solutions < 200 LOC Keep in Touch! Discussions on Discord "Tea Time" Office Hours Tuesday 3:30 | Friday 10:30 One-on-One Office Hours
